channel.title: Run Server ERROR
channel.description:
Hey, I get this error while trying to run my server:
[code=javascript]Loaded clipmap in 61ms. [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: Launching HyBriD PvP... [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [5/5/11 11:10 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Any suggestions? They're more than welcome!

item.title: Run Server ERROR
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

think means port is in use. close 1 server if you have 2 on or utorrent.
